thread.section_title: PGS Gold & Coin Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PGS Gold & Coin | pgsgoldandcoin.com
thread.title: Pam Mikeska
thread.title_full: PGS Gold & Coin reviewed by Pam Mikeska

author: Pam Mikeska
title: Pam Mikeska
text: This was my first experience working with PGS and Aaron was both honest & helpful. He even spent time educating me on the process for future transactions. As a professional organizer I am planning to use PGS as a resource for my clients & I will definitely recommend them in the future.
